author: Eliza Mackintosh, CNN
title: What does Putin want in Ukraine? The conflict explained
description: After months of military buildup and brinkmanship on its border with Ukraine, Russia invaded its ex-Soviet neighbor with a multi-pronged attack, threatening to destabilize Europe and draw in the United States.
